briefDescription: An actual image that is being drawn before being displayed on a window.
detailedDescription: Aggregate type containing data about an actual image that is being drawn before being displayed on a window.

items.name: draw_job
items.briefDescription: The pool used to draw onto the image.
items.detailedDescription: Programs drawing to the image should normally be using this pool to keep them synchronized between each other.

items.name: image
items.briefDescription: A vulkan_image_view, representing a VkImageView pointing towards the actual image.
items.detailedDescription: A vulkan_image_view, representing a VkImageView pointing towards the actual image.

items.name: frame_buffer
items.briefDescription: The image's vulkan_frame_buffer, representing a VkFramebuffer.
items.detailedDescription: The image's vulkan_frame_buffer, representing a VkFramebuffer.
